blockquote.blockquote: 1. Recently renamed city names details are not available in the datastore, but old name details are available i.e Bangaluru - Banglore etc.
2. Component's output is based on the input, mispelled city names are not automatically corrected by the system. i.e, city=Nashik wrong , city=Nasik correct

blockquote.li: Finding Mapped city for a given IP

blockquote.blockquote: 1. We use maxmind.com geoip embedded data store for look up services, This is a open source version, so the accuracy of detecting city name from ip is lesser than the Commercial Version.

div.p: The look up service limitations can be overcomed by buying the commercial version geoip datastore.
Please visit http://www.maxmind.com/app/products for more info.
